column4: When sometimes my mouse pointer jumps all over the place. Anyone know where to look?
not saying your problem is the same, but my old work's optical mouses had bad hardware in them tha would make the pointer just jump across the screen without moving the mouse
that would probably be in xorg.conf, you can change the settings, find the model of the mouse, and google it with intrepid and jumping, nad see if there are any hits
